permissions: Admin users or users who are broker members, or manager members of customer/trucker organizations, can list commitment simulation sets within their organization scope (including broker-linked customers/truckers).
validation_notes: --organization-id requires --organization-type unless provided as Type|ID via --organization or --organization-id. --status must be enqueued or processed. Organization type filters accept Broker, Customer, or Trucker.

flags.name: --organization
flags.description: Filter by organization (format: Type|ID, e.g., Broker|123)

flags.name: --organization-id
flags.description: Filter by organization ID (requires --organization-type or Type|ID)

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.description: Filter by organization type (e.g., Broker, Customer, Trucker)
flags.validation: Accepted values are Broker, Customer, or Trucker.

flags.name: --not-organization-type
flags.validation: Accepted values align with organization type names (e.g., Customer).
